text: Gerardo Jáuregui (born 25 May 1942) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Gerardo Jáuregui
